recipe.title: Apple and Celery Salad
instructions: In a small bowl whisk together mayonnaise, cilantro, lemon juice, and salt and pepper to taste until combined. Cut celery and apple into 1 1/2-inch-long thin julienne strips. Toss together celery, apple, dressing, and salt and pepper to taste.
